"2.0.1 The cover, audio and video independent download and ffmpeg combined video functions have been restored. Please be sure to check. "

"BILIBILIAS has had back-end support since the beginning of its operation. We currently use student computers, but even so, there will be a monthly fee.
Therefore, we hope that users of BILIBILIAS can support some expenses, such as breakfast, milk tea and lunch, which can meet most of the expenses of BILIBILIAS.
Finally, I would like to thank all users who have donated and supported AS for BILIBILIAS.
You can donate anonymously and anonymously. It is recommended not to donate anonymously.
Bring contact information such as AS and QQ number. "

"If you do not know the FFmpeg command, please do not modify it. 
BILIBILIAS provides you with simple command parameters. 
{VIDEO_PATH} video download path. 
{AUDIO_PATH} audio storage path. 
{VIDEO_MERGE_PATH} Storage path after merging. "
Reproduction of this video without permission is prohibited.
